casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Frederick John SCHUMANN No. 86P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 5, 2018 Ms. Amanda S. Zimmer, Southern Pines, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Schumann, Frederick John Ms. Kathryn J. Thomas, Raleigh, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina Mr. Frederick John Schumann, for Schumann, Frederick John Mr. Jon David, District Attorney, for State

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 12th of March 2018 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of April 2018."
